entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
